metadata.title: CVE-2024-56750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:erofs: fix blksize < PAGE_SIZE for file-backed mountsAdjust sb->s_blocksize{,_bits} directly for file-backedmounts when the fs block size is smaller than PAGE_SIZE.Previously, EROFS used sb_set_blocksize(), which causeda panic if bdev-backed mounts is not used.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
